title: Integration with Shiny
text: default map initially loads trigger loaded event Shiny. can use event trigger actions Shiny app. Shiny input value available input$<mapId>_loaded, <mapId> output ID map.
code: # In UI mapOutput("my_map")  # In server loaded events watching <map_id>_loaded input values observe({   req(input$my_map_loaded)   print("Map has loaded!") }) |>   bindEvent(input$my_map_loaded)

title: Integration with Shiny
text: Anytime feature (polygon, line, point) clicked map, feature_click event fired. can listen event using observer Shiny app. Just append _feature_click map ID get input ID (input$<mapId>_feature_click).
code: # In UI mapOutput("my_map")  # In server feature click events watching <map_id>_feature_click input values observe({   print(get_clicked_feature(input$my_map_feature_click)) })

title: Integration with Shiny
text: Whenever map view changes (zoom/bounds) bounds / zoom event fired. can listen event using observer Shiny app. Just append _bounds / _zoom map ID get input ID (input$<mapId>_bounds / input$<mapId>_zoom).
code: # In UI mapOutput("my_map")  # In server bounds / zoom events watching <map_id>_bounds / <map_id>_zoom input values observe({   print(input$my_map_bounds) })  observe({   print(input$my_map_zoom) })

title: Authors and Citation
text: Schlaadt P (2025). toro: Maplibre GL JS integration R. R package version 0.0.0.9005.
code: @Manual{,   title = {toro: Maplibre GL JS integration for R},   author = {Poppy Schlaadt},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9005}, }

what: Maplibre GL JS integration for R
title: Maplibre GL JS integration for R
text: toro package provides Maplibre GL JS integration R. learn use package:  Examples can found examples directory.

title: Maplibre GL JS integration for R
text: updates made package needs rebuilt: using package app copy updated .zip file. need uninstall old version package installing new one: add local package renv.lock file: renv::install("toro_<version>.tar.gz").
code: devtools::document() devtools::install() devtools::build() detach("package:toro", unload = TRUE) install.packages("toro_<version>.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type = "source") library(toro)

title: Maplibre GL JS integration for R
text: Add examples examples directory. Split add_layer function smaller functions layer type (e.g., add_polygon_layer, add_line_layer, etc.).

title: Add a draw control to the map — add_draw_control
code: add_draw_control(   map,   id = "draw_control",   position = "top-right",   modes = c("polygon", "trash"),   active_colour = "#0FB3CE",   inactive_colour = "#0FB3CE",   mode_labels = list() )

title: Add a draw control to the map — add_draw_control
text: map map map proxy object. position position draw control map. Default "top-right". Options "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-right". modes vector modes enable draw control. Default c("polygon", "trash"). Options include "polygon", "trash", "line". active_colour colour drawn shapes. Default "#0FB3CE". inactive_colour colour inactive shapes. Default "#0FB3CE". mode_labels named list labels mode. example, list(polygon = "Draw Polygon", trash = "Delete Shape").

title: Add a draw control to the map — add_draw_control
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

what: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
text: Functions: add_layer: Add layer map. add_fill_layer: Add fill layer map. add_circle_layer: Add circle layer map. add_line_layer: Add line layer map. add_symbol_layer: Add symbol layer map. add_lat_lng_grid: Add grid latitude longitude lines map. toggle_lat_lng_grid: Show hide latitude longitude grid. show_layer: Show previously hidden layer. hide_layer: Hide layer map. set_tile_layer: Set tile layer map. toggle_clustering: Toggle clustering layer. set_paint_property: Set paint property layer. set_layout_property: Set layout property layer. get_tile_options: Get available tile layer options. Add layer map map proxy.

title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
code: add_layer(   map,   id,   type = "fill",   source,   paint = NULL,   layout = NULL,   popup_column = NULL,   hover_column = NULL,   can_cluster = FALSE,   under_id = NULL,   filter = NULL )

title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
text: map map object map proxy layer added. id unique identifier layer. type type layer add (e.g., "fill", "circle", "line"). source data source layer, GeoJSON, converted. paint list paint options styling layer. layout list layout options layer. popup_column column name use popups. Default NULL. hover_column column name use hover effects. Default NULL. can_cluster Whether layer can clustered. Default FALSE. under_id ID another layer place layer . Default NULL. filter filter expression apply layer. Default NULL.

title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
code: The updated map object with the new layer added.

title: Get paint options for a specific layer type — get_paint_options
code: get_paint_options("line", list(colour = "blue", opacity = 0.8, line_width = 2)) #> $`line-color` #> [1] "blue" #>  #> $`line-opacity` #> [1] 0.8 #>  #> $`line-width` #> [1] 2 #>  get_paint_options("circle", list(colour = "red", circle_radius = 10, outline_colour = "black")) #> $`circle-color` #> [1] "red" #>  #> $`circle-opacity` #> [1] 1 #>  #> $`circle-radius` #> [1] 10 #>  #> $`circle-stroke-color` #> [1] "black" #>  #> $`circle-stroke-opacity` #> [1] 1 #>  #> $`circle-stroke-width` #> [1] 1 #>  # Use with get_column for data-driven styling: get_paint_options("fill", list(colour = get_column("color"), opacity = get_column("opacity"))) #> $`fill-color` #> $`fill-color`[[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[2]] #> [1] "color" #>  #>  #> $`fill-opacity` #> $`fill-opacity`[[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]] #> [1] "opacity" #>  #>  #> $`fill-outline-color` #> [1] "grey" #>  get_paint_options("fill", list(    colour = get_column_group("group", c("A" = "green", "B" = "blue")) )) #> $`fill-color` #> $`fill-color`[[1]] #> [1] "match" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[2]] #> $`fill-color`[[2]][[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[2]][[2]] #> [1] "group" #>  #>  #> $`fill-color`[[3]] #> [1] "A" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[4]] #> [1] "green" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[5]] #> [1] "B" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[6]] #> [1] "blue" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[7]] #> [1] "#cccccc" #>  #>  #> $`fill-opacity` #> [1] 1 #>  #> $`fill-outline-color` #> [1] "grey" #>  get_paint_options("fill", list(    opacity = get_column_step_colours("percent", c(25, 75), c("red", "orange", "yellow")) )) #> $`fill-color` #> [1] "grey" #>  #> $`fill-opacity` #> $`fill-opacity`[[1]] #> [1] "step" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]] #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]][[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]][[2]] #> [1] "percent" #>  #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[3]] #> [1] "red" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[4]] #> [1] 25 #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[5]] #> [1] "orange" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[6]] #> [1] 75 #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[7]] #> [1] "yellow" #>  #>  #> $`fill-outline-color` #> [1] "grey" #>

title: Create a Maplibre map widget. — map
text: style style map. Default "light-grey". center initial center map longitude/latitude pair. Default c(174, -41). zoom initial zoom level map. Default 2. width width widget. Optional. height height widget. Optional. session Shiny session object. Default current session. ... Additional options customize map.

title: Create a Maplibre map widget. — map

title: Set the map bounds. — set_bounds
text: map map map proxy object. bounds list two lists, containing longitude latitude pairs. example: list(list(-79, 43), list(-73, 45)). padding padding around bounds pixels. Default 50. maxZoom maximum zoom level set. Default object's maxZoom.
